mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.book_class_id AS "bookClassId", a.user_add_id AS "userAddId", a.owner_id AS "ownerId", a.holder_id AS "holderId", a.school_id AS "schoolId", a.campus_id AS "campusId", a.status AS "status", a.like_num AS "likeNum", a.total_borrowed AS "totalBorrowed"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( id, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, del_flag, remarks, ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, )
mapper.update: UPDATE SET update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, remarks = #{remarks}, WHERE id = #{id}
